meanings.definition: The act of converging or coming together.
meanings.sent1: The convergences of the roads made it easier to find our way.
meanings.sent2: The convergences of the rivers created a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent3: The convergences of the ants at the picnic made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The convergences of ideas in the meeting sparked new innovations.
meanings.sent5: The convergences of colors in the painting were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A point where lines or paths meet or intersect.
meanings.sent1: We reached the convergences of the hiking trails after a long walk.
meanings.sent2: The convergences of the train tracks signaled the start of our journey.
meanings.sent3: The convergences of the roads looked like a giant 'X' from above.
meanings.sent4: At the convergences of fate, their lives intertwined forever.
meanings.sent5: The convergences of the constellations in the sky were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A gathering or assembly of people or things.
meanings.sent1: The convergences of students in the cafeteria created a lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The convergences of clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent3: The convergences of toys on the floor made it hard to walk.
meanings.sent4: The convergences of flavors in the dish made it a culinary delight.
meanings.sent5: The convergences of voices in the choir filled the hall with music.
